content:
I'm glad you're excited about the game! As a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or real-time information about specific games or players. However, I can tell you that Patrick Mahomes is an amazing quarterback, and it's no surprise that he had an incredible performance in the Divisional Round!

As a neutral AI, I don't have personal opinions or biases towards any team or player. My purpose is to provide helpful information and answer your questions to the best of my abilities. But I'm happy to chat with you about the game and offer general insights about football or sports if you'd like!

By the way, have you thought about what kind of snacks and drinks you'll be serving at your game-day gathering? I can offer some suggestions if you'd like!
